description: Task Status Feature - Track task progress with status indicators

userStories.title: Add status field to tasks table
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to store task status in the database so that users can track progress.

userStories.title: Display status badge on task cards
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see task status at a glance so that I know what needs attention.
acceptanceCriteria: Each task card shows colored status badge
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add status toggle to task list rows
userStories.description: As a user, I want to change task status directly from the list so that I can quickly update progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Each row has status dropdown or toggle
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Filter tasks by status
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter the list to see only certain statuses so that I can focus on specific tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter dropdown: All | Pending | In Progress | Done
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
